comment.body: Feel free to show your face. We like to see selfies.
@Natalia: That's a certified ass, miss. I just like to see a face.
Lemme guess. You're a 20 year old Russian.
@Natalia: Well, heck. I lost. I usually think of myself as a good guesser.
Who took your picture?
@Bigbadbob: That's Milena Velba. You haven't seen big yet.
More of your cute face, please?
Even you and I can improve it with issues opened on GitHub.
Half a face is progress.
Good reason to have a woodstove.
[test image from 1A6kYPexXbPRLfDD1DK1oiqsBmWdBwun8f](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1A6kYPexXbPRLfDD1DK1oiqsBmWdBwun8f/data/users/1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4/1525789814-wallpaper-2576830.jpg)
@Musickiller: No problem.

It allows for audio files and has a few fixes, some in the CSS and one in content.json

It also has a darker style to it.

You still can't effectively delete your media though. Same old bug from KKBO.
@Musickiller: I wouldn't know where to put it nor know how.

For some odd reason my mother put it in a nasal spray bottle. I used it not knowing until it was already done. I've had less mucous blockage of my nasal passages since.

Maybe you mean not to use pure H202?
@Musickiller: You need to set the viewport on your blog.

@Musickiller: put this above zeronet_version in content.json

``` "viewport": "width=device-width, initial-scale=.8, user-scalable=0",```
@Musickiller: you need to change the cloned_from address to that of a blog with proper mobile optimizations, then upgrade the code via ZeroHello.
@Musickiller: I'm looking for a list of blogs, but I can't find it. You would want one based on the original ZeroBlog.
Avast keeps telling me my WiFi is unsecured while it is secured.

@Musickiller: Dumb Avast

Might as well try something else.
I think that's not a possibility right now.
